physical_examinations.vital_signs: Vital signs were within normal limits.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Body mass index of 24 (consistent with healthy weight).
Final pathology confirmed presence of organ-confined prostate cancer with negative surgical margins, pelvic lymph nodes, and seminal vesicles.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Erectile function was lost for approximately 9 months after surgery, but Mr. G regained the ability to achieve an erection on his own after 9 months and 16 days.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Nothing much was happening regarding erectile function.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement in erectile function observed, with the ability to get an erection returning.
